languages.text: {n}Блеснув очками, Наместник сухо бросает:{/n} "Я ценю таланты госпожи Хейдари, как и участие Вашей Светлости в ее судьбе. Но мы не пиратское сборище, мы — организация. Мы следуем правилам".

{n}His spectacles glinting, the Liege drily retorts,{/n} "I appreciate Mistress Heydari's talents and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s interest in her fate. But we are not a band of pirates, but an organisation with rules, and we abide by those rules."
languages.original_text: {n}Блеснув очками, Наместник сухо бросает:{/n} "Я ценю таланты госпожи Хейдари, как и участие Вашей Светлости в ее судьбе. Но мы не пиратское сборище, мы — организация. Мы следуем правилам".

traits.locale_text: {n}His spectacles glinting, the Liege drily retorts,{/n} "I appreciate Mistress Heydari's talents and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s interest in her fate. But we are not a band of pirates, but an organisation with rules, and we abide by those rules."
traits.speaker: Vladaym_Final

traits.speaker: Vladaym_Final

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆的镜片闪闪发光，无力地反驳道。{/n}“我很欣赏海达利女士的才华，也很感谢大人您对她的关心。不过，我们不是什么海盗，我们是有规矩的组织。我们必须得遵守这些规矩。”
languages.original_text: {n}His spectacles glinting, the Liege drily retorts,{/n} "I appreciate Mistress Heydari's talents and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s interest in her fate. But we are not a band of pirates, but an organisation with rules, and we abide by those rules."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆的镜片闪闪发光，无力地反驳道。{/n}“我很欣赏海达利女士的才华，也很感谢大人您对她的关心。不过，我们不是什么海盗，我们是有规矩的组织。我们必须得遵守这些规矩。”
traits.speaker: Vladaym_Final

languages.text: {n}メガネを輝かせながら、領主は言葉を返す。{/n}「ミストレス・ヘイダリの才能と、その運命にご興味をお持ちいただいたことには感謝いたします。ですが、我々は海賊の一団ではなく、ルールのある組織であり、そのルールを遵守セねばならんのですよ」
languages.original_text: {n}His spectacles glinting, the Liege drily retorts,{/n} "I appreciate Mistress Heydari's talents and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s interest in her fate. But we are not a band of pirates, but an organisation with rules, and we abide by those rules."

traits.locale_text: {n}メガネを輝かせながら、領主は言葉を返す。{/n}「ミストレス・ヘイダリの才能と、その運命にご興味をお持ちいただいたことには感謝いたします。ですが、我々は海賊の一団ではなく、ルールのある組織であり、そのルールを遵守セねばならんのですよ」
traits.speaker: Vladaym_Final

languages.text: {n}Con gafas relucientes, el Señor replica:{/n} «Tengo en gran estima los talentos de la señora Heydari y agradezco el interés de mi{mf|lord|lady} por su destino, pero no somos una banda de piratas sino una organización con reglas que debemos cumplir».
languages.original_text: {n}His spectacles glinting, the Liege drily retorts,{/n} "I appreciate Mistress Heydari's talents and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s interest in her fate. But we are not a band of pirates, but an organisation with rules, and we abide by those rules."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con gafas relucientes, el Señor replica:{/n} «Tengo en gran estima los talentos de la señora Heydari y agradezco el interés de mi{mf|lord|lady} por su destino, pero no somos una banda de piratas sino una organización con reglas que debemos cumplir».
traits.speaker: Vladaym_Final

languages.text: {n}Derrière le reflet de ses lunettes, le suzerain rétorque sèchement :{/n} « J'apprécie les talents de maîtresse Heydari et l'intérêt porté par Votre Seigneurie à son sort. Cela dit, nous ne sommes pas une bande de pirates, mais une organisation régie par des règles que nous respectons. »
languages.original_text: {n}His spectacles glinting, the Liege drily retorts,{/n} "I appreciate Mistress Heydari's talents and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s interest in her fate. But we are not a band of pirates, but an organisation with rules, and we abide by those rules."

traits.locale_text: {n}Derrière le reflet de ses lunettes, le suzerain rétorque sèchement :{/n} « J'apprécie les talents de maîtresse Heydari et l'intérêt porté par Votre Seigneurie à son sort. Cela dit, nous ne sommes pas une bande de pirates, mais une organisation régie par des règles que nous respectons. »
traits.speaker: Vladaym_Final

languages.text: {n}Die Brille des Lehnsherren glänzt und er entgegnet trocken:{/n} "Ich schätze Herrin Heydaris Talente und Euer Interesse an ihrem Schicksal, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Aber wir sind keine Piratenbande, sondern eine Organisation mit Regeln, und diese Regeln befolgen wir auch."
languages.original_text: {n}His spectacles glinting, the Liege drily retorts,{/n} "I appreciate Mistress Heydari's talents and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s interest in her fate. But we are not a band of pirates, but an organisation with rules, and we abide by those rules."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Brille des Lehnsherren glänzt und er entgegnet trocken:{/n} "Ich schätze Herrin Heydaris Talente und Euer Interesse an ihrem Schicksal, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Aber wir sind keine Piratenbande, sondern eine Organisation mit Regeln, und diese Regeln befolgen wir auch.
traits.speaker: Vladaym_Final

languages.text: {n}Üzerinde pırıl pırıl aksesuarlar taşıyan Emîr, ruhsuzca yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Üstat Heydari'nin yeteneklerini ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin kendisine dair ilgisini hoşnutlukla karşılıyorum. Ancak bizler bir korsan grubu değiliz, kuralları olan bir organizasyonuz ve bu kurallara uyarız."
languages.original_text: {n}His spectacles glinting, the Liege drily retorts,{/n} "I appreciate Mistress Heydari's talents and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s interest in her fate. But we are not a band of pirates, but an organisation with rules, and we abide by those rules."

traits.locale_text: {n}Üzerinde pırıl pırıl aksesuarlar taşıyan Emîr, ruhsuz bir tonda yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Üstat Heydari'nin yeteneklerini ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin kendisine dair ilgisini hoşnutlukla karşılıyorum. Ancak bizler bir korsan grubu değiliz, kuralları olan bir organizasyonuz ve bu kurallara uyarız."
traits.speaker: Vladaym_Final
